content.text:
# Draft:Twentieth Century House

Twentieth Century Fox Film Company Limited, also known as Twentieth Century House was the U.K. headquarters of the American film studio 20th Century Studios to distribute the studio's films in the United Kingdom and Ireland. The building was built in 1937 and abandoned in 2021 when Disney relocated staff, most signs have been removed.
The building was known for distributing some of the studio's most popular films such as Star Wars and Alien, and has also distributed films that have not been distributed by the studio in the United States such as Chariots of Fire and Titanic.
